svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total tax revenue (%GDP) vs Government effectiveness, 2013
Total tax revenue includes social contributions, direct and indirect taxes. Government Effectiveness captures
perceptions of the quality of public services, the quality of the civil service and the degree of its independence from
political pressures, the quality of policy formulation and implementation, and the credibility of the government's
commitment to such policies. The figures correspond to country scores in units of a standard normal distribution, i.e.
Government effectiveness (score scores in units of a standard normal distribution)
Source: ICTD, Worldbank via the Quality of Government dataset
